attribution: Provided by the Library of Congress
description: Relief shown in hachures. Shows various city rail lines in different colors. Stamped: "Library of Congress, Dec 24, 1906." Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
label: Map of the city of Los Angeles : showing railway systems
